meanings.definition: The quality or state of being able to be crossed.
meanings.sent1: The crossability of the bridge allowed people to safely walk across the river.
meanings.sent2: The crossability of the puzzle made it easy for children to solve.
meanings.sent3: The crossability of the roads made it convenient for travelers to reach their destination.
meanings.sent4: The crossability of the wires enabled the electricity to flow smoothly.
meanings.sent5: The crossability of the path was hindered by fallen trees after the storm.

meanings.definition: The ability to produce offspring when different species or varieties are crossed.
meanings.sent1: The farmer studied the crossability of different plants to create new hybrids.
meanings.sent2: The scientist researched the crossability of animals to understand genetic inheritance.
meanings.sent3: The crossability of the flowers resulted in a beautiful and unique garden.
meanings.sent4: The crossability of the bees led to the creation of a hardworking hybrid species.
meanings.sent5: The crossability of the birds in the aviary fascinated the visitors.
